base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray cabinet with minimalist design.
part_description: Four doors, two on top and two below, with vertical handles. Rectangular shape, evenly divided, positioned symmetrically. Compact, flat top and sides.
internal_interaction_description: The top and bottom doors open outward, revealing internal shelves. Each set of doors is hinged on the sides, allowing access to separate compartments. The handles provide grip for opening and closing the doors, maintaining alignment and balance.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet stands upright, suitable for placement against walls. It can store various items, interacting with users through door handles for access. Its neutral color and sleek design allow it to blend with different interiors, offering functional storage and aesthetic appeal.
